article_title: Nancy Pelosi on Jonathan Gruber in 2009 and now
article_text: - House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) said Thursday that she didn't know who Jonathan Gruber is, but she spoke about him in 2009 in footage surfaced by CSPAN. ()
